website_summaries.verdict: The Honor 10 offers a facsimile of the Huawei P20 Pro experience for a fraction of the price.
pros: High-end CPU for a midrange price
Fun camera effects including bokeh, 2x lossless zoom, and AI-assisted scene recognition
cons: Unlikely to come to US carriers

customer_reviews.title: Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot fault this phone. I've had iPhones for the last 8 years and thought I'd hate my life switching to android but this phone is fab and such a bargain. Battery lasts 2 days for me but I don't use social media, mainly calls, camera, shopping and WhatsApp
customer_reviews.author: Hebzo

customer_reviews.title: Alot cheaper than Iphone and Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Very good mobile. Easily competes with Iphone and Samsung, at more than half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Harro

customer_reviews.title: A good phone at great value.
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months of use (as my one and only phone) this has been great. There are a few hiccups, WiFi for example can suddenly freeze (turning it off and on again seems to fix it) and the 'stereo effects' on headphones is just plain awful, and has to be turned off each and every time you plug headphones in. That all said, I still feel this is a 5 star review (or maybe 4.5 at least) because its a nice looking phone that is quick, has huge storage, and does what I am looking for. Battery life could be better, but its no worse than previous phones I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I never thought a phone for low price can be superb. Comparing price to for example IPhone X, and/or Samsung S9 makes this phone great for what it can do for its low price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter this has proved to be a good purchase. Phone looks great and wish I had one myself the build quality is so good. However with my ltd needs the cost is prohibitive and I settled for a £100 phone. This phone looks to have very good all round performance and has been a great aid to opening up comms for my g/daughter. It's almost like a milestone in that she has greater freedom and can expand her social outlook. Expensive imo but with the better build I think worth the extra outlay. Just got to hope it doesn't get lost/stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Mr S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Reliable as a phone but has major problems elsewhere: Camera is overall poor. The shallow depth of field feature makes a decent image maybe 1 in 5 shots, so is pretty much unusable. Otherwise very hot and miss. The fingerprint sensor just does not work quickly or reliably, to the extent I've stopped using it, instead using less secure facial recognition.
customer_reviews.author: Napoleon's cat

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I ever had, saw a youtube comparison with IPhone X. Honor 10 won
customer_reviews.author: Alan W.

customer_reviews.title: 4gb ram 128gb memory charger after 1 day with the mobile data open it still had 90% battery
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect and has 4gb ram, very good for games and easy to use Quite cheap for what it can offer it comes with a charger and a cover for the phone also a glass cover from the factory on the screen and the needle for the sim card slots. Check the box carefully because i barely noticed that tool
customer_reviews.author: Vlad Cristi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Even though battery life is a little underwhelming, it’s a minor quibble with what is an exceptionally good phone for the price. The display, cameras and build quality are verging on those of a phone twice the price and the performance is the best I've seen on an Honor phone. The software is the best EMUI has ever offered, and the notch is not a big deal when all is said and done. The 128GB storage as standard is also a major plus, and dual SIM is also welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've ever had, stunning,
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I've ever had, huawei software is simple but convenient, it's like the phone actively helps you. The phone looks gorgeous out of the box. The only slightly poor thing is fingerprint scanner but it's not an issue, the camera takes stunning stunning stunning photos, pity it has to be in pro to take the full 24mp, i dont own a p20 pro but I feel like he honor 10 is its little bro.
customer_reviews.author: lar

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and performance.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my new phone, easily set up. Great look.
customer_reviews.author: Charlz B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phone
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with the phone, looks and feels good. Coming from a OnePlus I'm very pleased with the Honor 10. The main annoyance is that Fitbit devices are not compatible with this phone. Apart from that all good!
customer_reviews.author: David Hendry

customer_reviews.title: Solid and dependable
customer_reviews.text: A very solid, dependable and reliable phone - which is great for the price point sold at. Pity Huawei are under US embargo, as I would have gone for them again but would miss Google ecosystem a bit too much if not available.
customer_reviews.author: VEN RAMACHANDRAN

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The phone reboots periodically. I sent it back for repair. It has just returned but has the same fault. The repair notes said "drops calls", so they haven't even tried to fix the fault. This phone is a worthless piece of junk and I want my money back. I bought this phone as a present.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: Great spec for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone at a great price only quibble I have is the finger print sensor could be a bit more sensitive. Also love the fact that it comes with a high speed charger, gel case and factory fitted screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Alan G

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone. I thought there was expandable memory which there isnt.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for everyday usage
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for such a price just tought the camera will be better than honor x8 but it have not surprised me alot. Alltough I am getting inlove with honor phones
customer_reviews.author: Ernestas

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: With the astronomical rises in phone prices recently from the big two companies, this is the best budget phone you can buy today. It does everything those £1000 phones can do at a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phone
customer_reviews.text: I needed to update but do not use my phone for business so did not want to pay for a mini computer. That said though this phone is proving to be just that at a fraction of the cost of iPhone and galaxy. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: The touchscreen sensitivity is just rubbish. The fingerprint sensor is horrible. Other than that, it does the job. Would much prefer my honor 7 with updated memory and cpu
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: An overall great phone that punches well above it's price! Really good camera, plenty of storage, more than fast enough, intelligently switches between wifi and 4G, if you do want a better phone than this you gotta pay more then three times as much and why would you??
customer_reviews.author: m moll

customer_reviews.title: Just great!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for my girlfriend...she loves it! Camera is excellent and the colours are fantastic!! Is actually dual SIM and everything else they state is spot on! Very good phone!!
customer_reviews.author: MR B REEVE

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Really great phone, easy to use and battery lasts forever. Camera is amazing too! Would 150% recomend
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Simply a great phone.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter and I'm so jealous of her now. Great phone for the price and she loves it. Looks great, works great, very little bloatware and very stable. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Fresh Mint

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.text: Like this phone a lot. Cheap and works well. Only caveat: could not use my Google Drive phone backup to set up the phone, I think due to the conflict with Google.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value and very sturdy build. Very satisfied and would not hesitate to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Very good phone, Huawei speed and quality Honor prices
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone great battery life and a lovely screen. Only downside I have found is it doesn't switch between sims. A very small issue for me but that's why the battery life is so good.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Smart, full function phone that matches devices that are twice the price
customer_reviews.text: Tremendous value for money. Lovely screen and very well built. Great performance and functionality that is on a par with much dearer devices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price smart phone
customer_reviews.text: All round a great phone, always bought Sony phones but broke after being dropped a couple of times tried this phone and happy with build quality and response
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great performance for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a present. She absolutely loves this phone, great camera and good quick responsive interface
customer_reviews.author: Murf

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Not a "flagship" phone and certainly not at the premium price. But does everything you would expect of a phone and does it well. Battery life is still excellent and has never had any software or hardware issues so will be running with this for some time yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G.

customer_reviews.title: Reviewing after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Really good phone, nice camera and fast processor, still fast and with huge space in memory.
customer_reviews.author: Everson S.

customer_reviews.title: AI Camera is superior quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing forward camera and great battery life. I prefer this phone as a buy out right SIM free phone over any other. Only issue that annoys is the finger print is close to home button so will bomb out of apps if you are typing. Not a show stopper just annyonce
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: This phone will let you down.
customer_reviews.text: This phone will let you down when you need it. Other than that, excellent spec for the price. But the battery life means you can't guarantee it working from half charge even when being careful. Either fully charge each night, or keep cash for a payphone.
customer_reviews.author: Magda Flores

customer_reviews.title: nothing to say here! for this price is just ...
customer_reviews.text: nothing to say here! for this price is just bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Honor 10
customer_reviews.text: The phone looks well and is reliable and picks up the signal well. Battery life is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: flagship phone for the price of a midrange
customer_reviews.text: what can i say? it's a wonderful phone, loaded with features without a hefty price tag. Also, the emui interface is really solid and intuitive. Perhaps the camera is not as good as a top of the line phone, especially if ai is activated, but make good enough photos. I'd would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Ganfornina Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I don't like about this phone is the rubbish camera zoom it's pointless, part from that I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Round

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Really great phone and love the colour as well! Good battery life and loads of storage
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: Great smart phone
customer_reviews.text: Lovely looking smart phone, bought for my son he loves it, definately worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Lorna McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Is not worth for its price
customer_reviews.text: I am not very happy with this phone. For some reason I have to reset it every 4 or 5 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Vincenzo Maglione

customer_reviews.title: 5 star phone, recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my gf, she is very happy with it saying its the best phone she had. Im just glad she gave up on iphones!
customer_reviews.author: Lucian Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Great value product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son who is very happy and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: A notch above the iphone!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent easy to use phone with outstanding camera. Great battery life and extremely fast processor. Simple dual sim usage.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great phone. My only concern is when using WhatsApp ... Essential... It continually fades during video calls... Annoying
customer_reviews.author: M. lewis

customer_reviews.title: Affordable up to date phone
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant phone, most spent on one. Fab specs and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Dd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the money. Nice screen, good battery life good camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jeno Nagy

customer_reviews.title: Great phone good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great phone really happy with it, coming from iPhone I am happy with the build quality and how easy it is to use, the emui operating system is v similar to ios. Screen quality is great as I battery life and camera is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Boteler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mobile phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on the 15th of December and after 2 months of use I can easliy say that this is the best mobile phone I have ever bought so far.
customer_reviews.author: Salvo

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like the small keyboard... but I like very much the GPS function! It is a very good phone. I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great Value for money and camera specs meets my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kevron Catering

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This Smartphone is perfect, beautiful colour, really good camera, battery life efficient
customer_reviews.author: Astrée

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Happy with it. Speed excellent.. Face recognition doesn't always work for me. Average battery life
customer_reviews.author: Bouka

customer_reviews.title: It works very fast.
customer_reviews.text: loved the long lasting battery excellent all rounder the size could do with being larger say 6" as opposed to 5" but other than that 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: j b mchiggins

customer_reviews.title: Honor 10 phone
customer_reviews.text: The Honor 10 is an excellent phone. However I had expected a set of Honor earphones to come with the phone; that is normal I think. As there were no earphones I only rate it as 3.
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: Most Broken Phone Ever
customer_reviews.text: Phone worked fine, then kept restarting followed online advice now bricked don't buy cant trust them
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Paxton

customer_reviews.title: Honor 10
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my htc 10, thought i might regret it, not for a second, an outstanding phone for the price
customer_reviews.author: andy barlow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Can't believe all these features at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Charger
customer_reviews.text: Did not realise before buying that I was a different charger to normal Android. Feel this is something others would like to be aware of before buying
customer_reviews.author: Muireann Forde

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Took a little time getting used to lay out. Very responsive. Great camera. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, fast finger recognition and face recognition, easy to use, great camera, would recommend buying a screen protector and case
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Phone does not work
customer_reviews.text: Hello I Bay this phone a couple of months back is be how to gift and only yesterday open box and tried she switched on and it does not work. what should I do ?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a LG G3S to this phone and it is a massive improvement, I have had no issues with this phone to date.
customer_reviews.author: patrickb

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, fast device, good storage
customer_reviews.text: Great android phone, fast, easy to use. Only downside is some of the built in Huawei software.
customer_reviews.author: NGM

customer_reviews.title: The battery is great
customer_reviews.text: Works faster than any other phone I have owned connect to any network extra fast
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone for the price has flagship specs and has a decent camera too. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera Phone.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product at excellent configuration. But price should be less tha £300.
customer_reviews.author: Rajesh Bedarkar

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Tbh, the 8x is a much better phone to use
customer_reviews.author: LeonLeon

customer_reviews.title: Great mid range phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. Best mid range android phone on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Mr P.

customer_reviews.title: Whats not to like?
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. Does everything i need it to do. By the end of the day with g4 connection all day and general use have about 40% left. Camera good, again does what i need it for and the results are good. Face recognition works well too. And all that for a affordable price 😀
customer_reviews.author: Poo bear

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! its well worth it .
customer_reviews.text: Make no mistakes, this phone is a serious contender, punching well above its weight. Build quality, technology, speed, capability and above all a very reasonable price tag. Came with matching earphones and a £30 voucher off the overall price. Bought for my sons birthday, gutted I'm stuck in a 2yr contract because I want one now.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Davies.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this phone
customer_reviews.text: Read plenty of reviews about the phone before I purchased and it seemed a smart buy. This is an understatement. Had the phone 10 mins and I love it. Face recognition is super quick, finger print sensor quick, cameras great, screen looks awesome and the phone itself looks about £300+ more expensive than it is. The lack of waterproofing is a worry but you have to compromise at this price. If you're looking to buy a phone, make it this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: What a great find
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs it has face recognition finger print and password so you choose. Please don't buy protective cover or screen protection because it comes with screen protector on and with a clear cover.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia A. J. Alshatti

customer_reviews.title: Great smartphone - Honor 10
customer_reviews.text: Great deal & superfast service by seller. Phone arrived next day. Awesome phone. Great features, Light weight superfast charge. One point to add - reg storage. Some users mentjoned you can add microsd cadd but the slot doesn't allow in this phone. However 128GB is decent storage. So far quite happy. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mak

customer_reviews.title: Cool phone
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my wife. She absolutely loves it. The camera is great, being an android fan myself for the price its a great phone amazing.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great phone! Feels quality and very good value for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! Feels quality and very good value for money. Set-up was easy and it has a g o d battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Samuels

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. +Very very fast, +Excellent vivid screen (for an IPS panel) not OLED but pretty close, +Plenty of storage with very fast read and write speeds. (Measured Read 824MBs and Write 260+MBs). +TypeC + jack+ IR blaster. +Strong speaker +The face recognition works excellent and unlocks the phone instantly. -The only negative is the fingerprint sensor that sometimes may not recognise your thumb, but you don't really need it as the face recognition is all you need.(and yes it works with wet hands but who cares)
customer_reviews.author: Ktsingos

customer_reviews.title: Good Phone (But)
customer_reviews.text: The Honor 10 is a very good phone however there are two items that may make you stay with the Honor 9. The first is the finger print reader is very unreliable and the 2nd is the notification light is so small that it is almost impossible to see. Both of these item work very well with the Honor 9. Thankfully the face unlock works very well as does the phone in general. The sound and picture quality is very good and with an excellent camera the phone is good value. I just wish the two mentioned items were as good as the previous model.
customer_reviews.author: Malc

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone with the performance of a flagship for half the price.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone. I have bought this phone a week ago and I regret nothing. The performance is amazing and the camera quality is stunning. Battery life may have been better but not for this price. I love this phone and my eyes just can't stop watching the color shifting back of this phone. I would recommend this phone to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: KokoJamb01

customer_reviews.title: Bargain at 229
customer_reviews.text: Great phone... Especially for the amazing flash sale price! If the price comes down I might buy some for the rest of the family... Not paying 350 though!! Camera isn't amazing but the phone is a great size and is a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Parkes

customer_reviews.title: Update it to the last software version. Its a must
customer_reviews.text: Very good smartphone with a low price. Its totally worth it. This phone has exactly the specs of P20 Pro, the only difference is that P20 Pro has an extra camera and that is making it more expensive
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: At the time of writing this review i challenge anyone to find a better phone for the money. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Alf Garnet

customer_reviews.title: Great specs, looks beautiful l but gets to warm
customer_reviews.text: This phone has great specs and looks amazing however I've chosen to return it because the back is getting to hot after a hr of normmal usage. I might have got a bad batch but maybe all of the phones get that hot.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Malone

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life (2 days moderate use)
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life (2 days moderate use). Camera is brilliant and the screen size is large which is great and still fits in your pocket. Face unlock is suprisingly good and very quick, works instantly 95% of the time, such a simple feature makes it dream to use when frequently locking and unlocking. Had an honor before this one and it was great.
customer_reviews.author: J123

customer_reviews.title: A good smart phone.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone to replace my Honor 9 which got broken when I fell on it! (Anyone want a banana shaped smart phone that still works?) Its advantages are more memory, faster CPU, a marginally larger screen in the same sized case and so on. But in a couple of minor ways it isn't so good. The fingerprint recognition is poor, I mostly have to enter the PIN. And the PIN can only be 6 digits maximum, whilst the Honor 9 allowed me at least 7. Like most smart phones this comes wit the usual bloat ware preinstalled, much of which, annoyingly, cannot be removed without rooting the phone. A worthy successor, but with a few quirks
customer_reviews.author: P. J. A. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this phone. I first spotted it not long after it's release & knew then & there I wanted it, I just needed to wait until it went down to an affordable price. It was worth the wait - I love the colour & it's a great little phone, as good as the flagship phones I'd say. The battery life is great, especially as I play some battery intensive games, but the battery lasts so much longer than on my previous phone. Even when listening to music and browsing on it through the day, I'm finding I don't always need to charge it every day, which is brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I just love this phone all around, I am using it for over a year and I don't think I will replace it any time soon. It does the job for me and what I do. If you are getting this phone for the pictures/videos, just be aware the pictures turn out a bit redish and it has grains when shooting in low light/night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted the new Apple X however I talked him into this phone after many reviews. He loves it , no more tied to apple and its costly extras, 24mps camera is superb, quad core cpu, it does everything better. The battery life is important to him and it lasts 50 % longer than iPhone 7 . We are all considering changing now, what a great phone at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Maclennan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely get a good quality case to protect it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone great battery life. I use my phone to run my smart home so check in a lot with security cameras etcetera. I also use it to watch TV on my break at work and to listen to music for a couple of hours battery has not dropped below 50% yet so very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne68

customer_reviews.title: Great phone and as good as an iphone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, transition from apple to android was quite easy. Phone works really well, finger print reader works very well and the face recognition is great. NFC works very well. Excellent value for money and as good as an iphone
customer_reviews.author: ALONG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for money
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing phone. The transition from iphone to this was so easy. Takes amazing photos, the battery lasts a day with heavy usage and the price is great. You can install and uninstall apps as you like and it seems the phone does the upgrades when you charge it. I'm still struggling a bit with the keyboard but you get loads of options to choose from so I just haven't found my easy one
customer_reviews.author: L.Z

customer_reviews.title: Partially waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This phone has been absolutely brilliant for a year now! No issues, amazing camera, brilliant battery life and fast charge. Also, I managed to drop it in the water today and NO DAMAGE AT ALL! I just read it's partially waterproof, which I did not know before. Awesome phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jells

customer_reviews.title: great bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: exceptional quality for the price. good fingerprint reader and face recognition. holds charge well. great screen. excellent camera with plenty of internal storage. if you can get past the current huawei trust reports then this is an excellent piece of kit
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: this phone has a great batter life and is snappy in speed. If you are worried about the notch don't be disheartened you can "turn i off" in the settings such that it doesn't block your view of certain content ( if you are curious check out Linus Tech Tips as they did do a showcase of the device and explained this)
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: bought because it supported wifi calling
customer_reviews.text: bought this phone because EE signal at home is hopeless so thought it had wifi calling phoned EE and they don't support this phone for wifi calling , wish i had known that before buying, will swap to 3 network soon as possible but can't find anywhere in settings where it mentions wifi calling maybe it only apears when network supports it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Initially happy, but that's faded
customer_reviews.text: So, 5 months after purchase and the speaker is playing up. Half the time, there's no sound unless you tap the case in the magic spot. Everything else about the phone is great, but it's getting tiring missing alarms and calls.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous phone for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for £219 in a black Friday sale, woohoo! Great screen, fast processor, 128GB storage, 4GB RAM, brilliant camera, what's not to like!
customer_reviews.author: Eli Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Premium quality
customer_reviews.text: The best phone i have owned, better than my iPhone 8 i had. Camera is amazing, beautiful design, great speakers on it, amazing touch screen finger scanner, face recognition is good and the battery lasts a full day and can even last a ull half day over constant Netflix watching over 4g
customer_reviews.author: Huw

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Definetley great value for money phone have had a couple months now as my new daily, coming from ios was difficult being two different UI but after a couple of days I got used to the size and build of the phone
customer_reviews.author: Edgy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the item is excellent as is the battery life. Screen clarity and sharpness is of very high standard.
customer_reviews.author: saor99

product_meta.title: Honor 10 Dual SIM, 128 GB storage, 24 MP Dual Camera and 5.84 Inch Full View Display, UK Official Device - Phantom Blue
product_meta.description:
HONOR 10 SIM-FREE SMARTPHONE, BLUE




HONOR 10 IS EQUIPPED WITH CUTTING EDGE SMARTPHONE TECHNOLOGY.
With a 19:9 Inch FHD+ all screen display, 4GB RAM plus 128GB ROM, enhanced dual camera, super charge and the Android 8 software. Honor 10 is also powered by an AI processor boosting the performance to the higher level in market.

HONOR 10 WILL BE THE AI PHONE WITH IT'S STUNNING DESIGN AND PHOTO CAPABILITIES.
The Honor 10 is equipped with cutting edge smartphone technology. Possessing a 19:9 FHD+ all screen display, 4GB RAM + 128GB ROM, advanced dual camera, super charge, and the latest Android 8 software.

Honor 10 is also powered by an AI processor, boosting the performance to the highest level in today's market.

Honor 10 will be the first AI phone to lead you to a new era with it's stunning design and photo capabilities.

3D Portrait lighting with updated face recognition and facial modelling, along with AI-powered system creates professional studio lighting effects.



BOX CONTAINS


 * Handset
 * Charger
 * Type-C cable
 * Quick start guide
 * Warranty card
 * Eject tool
 * TPU protective case
 * TP protective film
feature_bullets: Honor 10 - beauty in AI; different angles, different colours with Honor's aurora glass design reflects vivid colours from every direction
A 5.84 Inch 19: 9 Honor full view display - ideal for a one-handed grip
24 MP+16 MP AI camera - taking you from being an amateur to a professional photographer; with real-time recognition of 500+ scenarios in 22 categories
3, 400 mAh large battery, charging to 50 percent in just 25 minutes
The latest generation of the Kirin 970 chipset equipped with the industry-leading Neural Processing Unit (NPU) delivers faster and more efficient AI algorithm performance
